condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Covid-19 Preparedness & Response in Schools,which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Operations Support To Programme Delivery (Covid), Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Supply And Logistics, Supply And Logistics (Covid), Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

description.narrative: UNICEF built humanitarian preparedness and response capacity of the PNG WASH cluster through training of 16 cluster partner representatives and procuring WASH in emergency coordination handbook and WASH resilience guidelines for the cluster members. UNICEF contributed to strengthen rapid assessment tools and assessed WASH needs of the refugee influx from West Papua and sourced WASH supplies to meet the needs of the population in camps. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2020
